title: TiKV/Importer should ignore tombstoned stores
body:
## Bug Report

Currently TiKV/Importer gets all stores via the `get_all_stores` API. Its result includes tombstoned stores. TiKV/Importer should ignore them, otherwise there will be unexpected behaviors, eg, try to connect to an invalid address https://github.com/pingcap/tidb/issues/9269 .
